characterDescription: Gangnah was a Parshendi elder, a foremost member of their ruling council,  and one amongst three who were present at the assassination of King Gavilar, plus one who had expressed responsibility for his death to his daughter Jasnah. After having been asked by Jasnah why, Gangnah admitted that the Parshendi had hired the Assassin because it had to be done. Because her father was about to do something very dangerous.
